question: Which state has approved a bill to make Bodo an associate official language of the state?
explanation:
The Assam cabinet recently approved the Assam Official Language Amendment Bill to make Bodo an associate official language of the state.
In February 2020, the third Bodo peace accord was signed between the Centre, Assam government, four Bodo rebel groups and two Bodo organizations. Declaring Bodo as associate official language was one of the clauses of the accord.
